If you don't, put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Skadi, Fierce Protectress
card.text: Trample Whenever Skadi, Fierce Protectress or another Shaman you control enters you may pay {RG}. If you do, it fights up to one target creature you don't control.

card.name: Arnfinn & Sif, Aerscouts
card.text: Flying, haste Whenever you forge, you may create a 1/1 white and red Dwarf Warrior creature token with lifelink and haste. If you do, attach that equipment to it.

card.name: Urdie, Inquisite Scholar
card.text: Exile an instant or sorcery spell you control: Urdie, Inquisite Scholar invokes. Activate only once each turn. (Cast a copy of this creature's Skill without paying its mana cost.) --- (Back): Soul Conduction

card.name: Soul Conduction
card.text: Soul Conduction deals 2 damage to any target. Draw a card. --- (Front): Urdie, Inquisite Scholar

card.name: Hodur, Varloch Elder
card.text: Convoke Whenever Hodur, Varloch Elder enters or attacks, create an X/X Blue Goat Spirit creature token, where X is the number of tapped creatures you control.

card.name: Dritta, Shadewrought
card.text: If you would create one or more tokens, you may instead return Dritta, Shadewrought from your graveyard to the battlefield and put that many +1/+1 counters on it. Counters remain on Dritta as it moves to any zone other than a player's hand or library.

card.name: Malignatus, Prison-Breaker
card.text: Flying When Malignatus, Prison-Breaker enters, you may discard your hand. If you do, draw three cards. {B}{R}, Sacrifice two artifacts and/or creatures: Return Malignatus from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Rind, Head Priestess
card.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, each opponent mills cards equal to the greatest power among Horror creatures you control. Then if a graveyard has thirteen or more cards in it, Rind, Head Priestess invokes. (Cast a copy of this creature's Skill without paying its mana cost.) --- (Back): Gelid Invocation

card.name: Gelid Invocation
card.text: For each opponent, put up to one target creature card from their graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. They become Horrors in addition to their other types. --- (Front): Rind, Head Priestess

card.name: Hoenir, Reclaimed Might
card.text: Trample, hexproof from enchantments. Whenever you cast a snow spell, you may draw three cards. Whenever a snow land you control enters, put three +1/+1 counters on target creature you control.

card.name: Sven, Fjord Cliffdancer
card.text: Flash Flying When Sven, Fjord Cliffdancer enters, untap up to X lands you control, where X is the number of permanents you control with flash, then you draw X cards and gain X life.

card.name: Treefolk DWA
card.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Dwarf Warrior DWA
card.text: Lifelink, haste

card.name: Ari, Adventure Seeker
card.text: When Ari, Adventure Seeker enters, create Magnus, a legendary 3/3 white Snow Yeti creature token with vigilance. Whenever a token you control enters, if you control three or more tokens with different names, you may have Ari invoke. Do this only once. (Cast a copy of this creature's Skill without paying its mana cost.) --- (Back): Snowball Fight!

card.name: Snowball Fight!
card.text: Snowball Fight! deals damage to target creature equal to the number of tokens you control. --- (Front): Ari, Adventure Seeker

card.name: Demon DWA
card.text: Haste

card.name: Magnus DWA
card.text: Vigilance
